articles.title: Ukraine war: Russia wants to destroy Europeans' normal life, Zelensky warns - BBC
articles.description: Russia is trying to attack Europe with "poverty and political chaos", President Zelensky says.
articles.content:
Russia wants to destroy the normal life of every European citizen, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has said.

articles.author: Mediahuis Ireland
articles.title: Kinahan gang ally Raffaele Imperiale claims extradition from Dubai to Italy was 'kidnapping' - Sunday World
articles.description: Kinahan gang associate Raffaele Imperiale tried to claim his extradition from Dubai to Italy was a “kidnapping” and in breach of the European Convention on Human Rights.
articles.content: Kinahan gang associate Raffaele Imperiale tried to claim his extradition from Dubai to Italy was a kidnapping and in breach of the European Convention on Human Rights.

articles.title: Russia's Gazprom keeps pipeline shut as Siemens disputes maintenance challenge claims - CBC News
articles.description: Russia kept one of its main gas supply routes to Europe shut on Saturday, stoking fears of winter fuel shortages and spotlighting differences between Gazprom and Germany's Siemens Energy over repair work on the pipeline.

articles.title: EU ready if Russia halts gas supplies – Official - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The European Union Economy Commissioner, Paolo Gentiloni, said Saturday that the European Union was "well prepared" in the event of a total halt in Russian gas deliveries, thanks to storage capacity and energy-saving measures.
